• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday, extending a strong start to the year after worries about the Omicron variant of the coronavirus subsided and travel stocks bounced. .N

At 6:37 a.m. ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.35% at 36,582. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.38% at 4,804, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.35% at 16,544.

The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.NQ:
** Nine Energy Service Inc <NINE.N>, up 10.2%
** Borr Drilling Ltd <BORR.N>, up 8.8%
** Uphealth Inc <UPH.N>, up 7.7%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.NQ:
** Core & Main Inc <CNM.N>, down 10.7%
** Select Energy Services Inc <WTTR.N>, down 10.4%
** New York City REIT Inc <NYC.N>, down 7.4%

The top two Nasdaq percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.O:
** Allena Pharmaceuticals Inc <ALNA.O>, up 60.6%
** Neurobo Pharmaceuticals Inc <NRBO.O>, up 41.3%

The top two Nasdaq percentage losers premarket .PRPL.O:
** Medicenna Therapeutics Corp <MDNA.O>, down 13.6%
** Akso Health Group <AHG.O>, down 11.6%


** Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O: up 0.3% premarket
BUZZ-Sharp short-covering in Amazon shares points to bullish trend - S3 (Full Story)

** Airbnb Inc ABNB.O: up 1.1% premarket
BUZZ-Airbnb gains on settlement over Cuba sanctions violations (Full Story)

** Chevron Corp CVX.N: up 0.5% premarket
BUZZ-Credit Suisse raises PT for Chevron on higher commodity prices (Full Story)
